subject: New  Information for Friends that Research
author: Laura Kimberley
full_text:
Hi All,

 I wanted to share an announcement. Ray Jorden and Jaine Gray had a 
wonderful interview with Annette of http://www.ispiinvestigations.com/
The Interview will be out at the 1st of the month.

Also were excited to announce they will be appearing "LIVE" on 

http://www.apsrradio.com    with Michael himself the "DJ Old Hip"
tomorrow night March 12, 2008 at 9pm  11 pm eastern time. You can go 
there and click on the link Apsr Chat  it's called the pal talk chat 
room. They will be sharing their Paranormal 5 information and well as 
their Famous and Frightened Charity event. They will be taking 
questions, so if you want to chat with them and ask questions, then 
be there and we can all have a great time. Be sure and check out 
their website: 

Http://www.famousandfrightened.com 

and Ray Jorden's official web site

http://www.RayJorden.com

You may also visit them at their MySpace links. They would enjoy 
hearing from all of you and your experiences.

http://www.myspace.com/rayjorden 

http://www.myspace.com/jainescrystalhealing

 


Blessings all.

Laura
